sentences.en: " Ah, now you're all right. What was the matter with you, Tom? "
sentences.cn: “ 啊, 你现在没事了, 汤姆,你到底是怎么啦? ”

sentences.en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentences.cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentences.en: Ah Q had always had the greatest contempt for such people as little nuns.
sentences.cn: 小尼姑之流是阿Q本来视如草芥的.

sentences.en: Ah Q would rise to the bait as usual, and glare furiously.
sentences.cn: 阿Q照例地发了怒, 他怒目而视了.

sentences.en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
sentences.cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

sentences.en: Ah, a long, cool , refreshing drink! Just what the doctor ordered!
sentences.cn: 哦, 一大杯清涼提神的饮料! 正是我想要的!
哦, 我 想 起来了.

sentences.en: Ah, Julia, my dear, here is our guest. May we have some tea?
sentences.cn: 喂，朱莉娅，亲爱的，来客人了。沏点茶好吗？

sentences.en: Ah, so you've bought new slippers yet!
sentences.cn: 啊, 所以你还买了新拖鞋!

sentences.en: Ah, this fruit is really sweet!
sentences.cn: 哎呀, 这种水果真甜哪!

sentences.en: I'm meeting Anna Langenbach. Ah, this seems to be the train now.
sentences.cn: 我要去见安娜·朗根巴赫。啊，这像是我要乘坐的火车了。

trans.tran_en: used to show surprise, happiness, agreement etc

trans.tran_cn: (Ah)人名；(中)亚(广东话·威妥玛)；(缅)阿
